description: An aesthetic dashboard for Node Exporter beginners and learners, or light users.

targets.expr:
(
  # CPU ÏÇ¨Ïö©Î•† - NaN Î∞©ÏßÄ
  (1 - (1 - clamp_min(clamp_max((
    avg by (instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) or
    avg by (instance)(rate(windows_cpu_time_total{job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval]))
  ), 1), 0)) ^ 1.1) ^ (1/2) * 0.5 + 
  
  # Î©îÎ™®Î¶¨ ÏÇ¨Ïö©Î•† - NaN Î∞©ÏßÄ
  (1 - (1 - clamp_min(clamp_max((
    avg by (instance)(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{job="$job"} / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="$job"}) or
    avg by (instance)(windows_os_physical_memory_free_bytes{job="$job"} / windows_cs_physical_memory_bytes{job="$job"})
  ), 1), 0)) ^ 2) ^ (1/2) * 0.3 + 
  
  # ÎîîÏä§ÌÅ¨ ÏÇ¨Ïö©Î•† - NaN Î∞©ÏßÄ
  (1 - clamp_max(clamp_min((
    max by (instance)(rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])) or
    (1 - min by (instance)(rate(windows_logical_disk_idle_seconds_total{job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))
  ), 0), 1) ^ 1.05) ^ (1/1.5) * 0.2
) * 100

clamp_min((1 - avg(
  rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval]) or
  rate(windows_cpu_time_total{job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])
) by (instance)) * 100, 0)

panels.description: This metric provides relatively accurate results within 6-hour period.

targets.expr:
sum(irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="$job", instance=~".*", device=~"eth.*|ens.*|eno.*|enp.*|enx.*|enX.*|wlan.*|wlnet.*"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
    irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{job="$job", instance=~".*", device=~"eth.*|ens.*|eno.*|enp.*|enx.*|enX.*|wlan.*|wlnet.*"}[$__rate_interval])) * 10
or
sum(irate(windows_net_bytes_sent_total{job="$job", instance=~".*", nic!~"isatap.*|VPN.*"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
    irate(windows_net_bytes_received_total{job="$job", instance=~".*", nic!~"isatap.*|VPN.*"}[$__rate_interval])) * 10

panels.title: Overall Traffic Usage (Approx.)

targets.expr:
sum(increase(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="$job", instance="$node", device=~"eth.*|ens.*|eno.*|enp.*|enx.*|enX.*|wlan.*|venet.*"}[30d])) + 
sum(increase(node_network_receive_bytes_total{job="$job", instance="$node", device=~"eth.*|ens.*|eno.*|enp.*|enx.*|enX.*|wlan.*|venet.*"}[30d]))
or
sum(increase(windows_net_bytes_sent_total{job="$job", instance="$node", nic!~"isatap.*|VPN.*"}[30d])) + 
sum(increase(windows_net_bytes_received_total{job="$job", instance="$node", nic!~"isatap.*|VPN.*"}[30d]))

count(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job", instance="$node", mode="system"}) by (instance)
or
count(windows_cpu_core_frequency_mhz{job="$job", instance="$node"}) by (instance)

(node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="$job", instance="$node", device!~'rootfs'} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="$job", instance="$node", device!~'rootfs'})
or
(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{job="$job", instance="$node"} - windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{job="$job", instance="$node"})

sum(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}) by (cpu)))
or
avg(rate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode="privileged"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}) by (cpu)))
or
avg(rate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}) by (cpu)))
or
avg(rate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode="interrupt"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode!='idle', mode!='user', mode!='system', mode!='iowait', mode!='irq', mode!='softirq'}[$__rate_interval])) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}) by (cpu)))
or
avg(rate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode!="idle", mode!="user", mode!="privileged", mode!="interrupt"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node", job="$job"}) by (cpu)))
or
avg(rate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$node", job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg(time() - node_boot_time_seconds{job="$job", instance="$node"})
or
avg(time() - windows_system_boot_time_timestamp{job="$job", instance="$node"})

{hostname=~"(?i)^$node_short(\\..*)?$"}
| logfmt
| regexp "(?:^|\\s)hostname:(?P<hostname>\\S+).*?service_name:(?P<service_name>\\S+)(?:.*?(?:event_id|id):(?P<event_id>\\S+))?"
| regexp "(?P<raw>.*)"
|~ "(?i)(${severity})"
|~ "${filter}"
| label_format node="{{.hostname}}", svc="{{or .service_name .program .app}}", eid="{{.event_id}}"
| line_format "{{.node}} {{.svc}}{{if .eid}} Ev{{.eid}}{{end}} ‚Äî {{or .msg .message .raw .entry}}"

{computer=~"(?i)^$node_short(\\..*)?$"}
| json | logfmt
| label_format node="{{ .computer }}",
               svc="{{ if .service_name }}{{ .service_name }}{{ else if .program }}{{ .program }}{{ else if .app }}{{ .app }}{{ else if .channel }}{{ .channel }}{{ end }}",
               eid="{{ if .event_id }}{{ .event_id }}{{ else if .eid }}{{ .eid }}{{ else if .id }}{{ .id }}{{ end }}",
               level="{{- if eq .levelText `Critical` -}}critical{{- else if eq .levelText `Error` -}}error{{- else if eq .levelText `Warning` -}}warning{{- else if eq .levelText `Information` -}}info{{- else -}}info{{- end -}}"
| line_format "{{ .node }} {{ .svc }}{{ if .eid }} Ev{{ .eid }}{{ end }} ‚Äî {{ if .Message }}{{ .Message }}{{ else if .message }}{{ .message }}{{ else if .msg }}{{ .msg }}{{ else if .rendered_message }}{{ .rendered_message }}{{ else if .event_data }}{{ .event_data }}{{ else if .EventData }}{{ .EventData }}{{ else if .raw }}{{ .raw }}{{ else if .entry }}{{ .entry }}{{ end }}"

{from="state-history"}
| json ruleTitle="ruleTitle", current="current", previous="previous",
      inst="labels.instance", inst2="labels_instance",
      vA="values.A", vB="values.B", vC="values.C",
      th="labels.threshold", ann_th="annotations.threshold", unit="annotations.unit"
| __error__ = ""
| (inst=~"(?i)^$node_short$" or inst2=~"(?i)^$node_short$")
|~ "$filter"
| regexp `"values":\{"A":(?P<valShort>\d+(?:\.\d{0,2})?)`
| regexp `"threshold":(?P<thShort>\d+(?:\.\d{0,2})?)`
| line_format "{{if eq .current \"Alerting\"}}üî• ALERT{{else if eq .current \"Pending\"}}‚è≥ PENDING{{else}}‚úÖ RESOLVED{{end}} ‚Äì {{.ruleTitle}} @{{or .inst .inst2}} (val={{or .valShort .vA .vB .vC}}{{if or .thShort .th .ann_th}} / th={{or .thShort .th .ann_th}}{{end}}{{if .unit}} {{.unit}}{{end}}, prev={{.previous}})"

title: 1. FTT_AWS_IDC_server_resource-dashboard
